${modID}:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
${modID}:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This will automatically be used if the card is upgraded. Remove it if unneeded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

${modID}:Stone.NAME: Stone Throw
${modID}:Stone.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage NL Shuffle Avalanche into draw pile.

${modID}:Avalanche.NAME: Avalanche
${modID}:Avalanche.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage X times. NL Exhaust

${modID}:BlackHole.NAME: Black Hole
${modID}:BlackHole.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block NL Shuffle White Hole into draw pile.

${modID}:WhiteHole.NAME: White Hole
${modID}:WhiteHole.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block NL Shuffle Salt into draw pile. NL Exhaust

${modID}:Salt.NAME: Salt
${modID}:Salt.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block NL Gain !M! Dexterity NL Gain !M! Strength NL Exhaust

${modID}:Uranium.NAME: Uranium
${modID}:Uranium.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block NL 50% chance to shuffle Internet into draw pile. NL 50% chance to shuffle Templars into draw pile

${modID}:WomanRights.NAME: Woman`s Intuition
${modID}:WomanRights.DESCRIPTION: Become Invincible this turn NL Exhaust
${modID}:WomanRights.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Become Invincible this turn NL Retain NL Exhaust

${modID}:SameThingAgain.NAME: Do This Again
${modID}:SameThingAgain.DESCRIPTION: Repeat last played card that targets self NL Exhaust
${modID}:SameThingAgain.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Repeat last played card that targets self

${modID}:ShieldImp.NAME: Shielding Imp
${modID}:ShieldImp.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block NL Attracts a Gremlin

${modID}:FatImp.NAME: Fat Imp
${modID}:FatImp.DESCRIPTION: Deals !D! damage NL Apply !M! Weak NL Attracts a Gremlin

${modID}:SneakyImp.NAME: Sneaky Imp
${modID}:SneakyImp.DESCRIPTION: Deals !D! damage NL Attracts a Gremlin

${modID}:NobImp.NAME: Imp Nob
${modID}:NobImp.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Gold NL Obtain a Potion NL Attracts a Gremlin NL Exhaust

${modID}:DeskSlam.NAME: Slam the Desk
${modID}:DeskSlam.DESCRIPTION: Applies !M! Weak to all Enemies NL Exhaust
